thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: HeidelbergCement's Q1 core profit down a third on cold weather

author: Reuters Editorial
title: HeidelbergCement's Q1 core profit down a third on cold weather
text:
FRANKFURT, May 9 (Reuters) - HeidelbergCement, the worldâ€™s No.2 cement maker, on Wednesday said first-quarter core earnings fell by a third, joining larger rival LafargeHolcim in citing cold temperatures that made construction activity more difficult.
The result from current operations before depreciation and amortisation (RCOBD) dropped 34 percent to 252 million euros ($299 million) in the first quarter, below the 348 million average analyst forecast in a Reuters poll. ($1 = 0.8436 euros) (Reporting by Christoph Steitz Editing by Maria Sheahan)
